title: 0/BD, Flexible lease terms available, North Hollywood CA
posting_body: ['Set in the heart of North Hollywood, The Marquee Apartments is everything you could ever want.', 'With proximity to everything from the sandy Southern California coastline to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of Los Angeles, your most difficult decision will be how to spend the weekends.', '-Refrigerator', '-Controlled-entry access', '-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Landscaped courtyards', '-Oversized closets with built-on shelving', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Minutes from the Hollywood Freeway', '-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', '-Professional onsite management', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
